page.title: 12RECREATION IN CLOPHILL
page.content: We are lucky to have so many clubs in {Clophill}which cater for all age groups. Still the youngsters complain that there is nothing to do. { Sporting activities}include clubs or leagues for archery, cribbage, darts, dominoes, junior & senior football, & tug-of-war. { Other clubs}&{associations}include Brownies,Christian Fellowship, Conservation group, Conservatives, Derby & Joan, Flower club, Friends of Cheshire Home, Girl Guides, St.Mary's Players, St.Mary's PTA, and Womens Institute. We have a good{playing field}with swings & slides. There are football pitches also. At{Beadlow}there is a squash club & a golf course. A{mobile library}calls fortnightly to various locations in the village.
